official_title: Support Through Remote Observation and Nutrition Guidance Program for Individuals With Pancreatic Cancer Undergoing Surgery (STRONG-PCS)
inclusion_criteria:
* â‰¥18 years old
* Diagnosis of pancreatic cancer
* Completed open pancreatic surgery (e.g., Whipple, distal/subtotal pancreatectomy, total pancreatectomy) for treatment at Moffitt Cancer Center
* Discharged on an oral diet
* Able to speak and read English or Spanish
* Able to provide informed consent
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Determined to be ineligible for surgery during evaluation (e.g., cancer metastasis)
